snippet.title: [Odd Sequence PV] A Fast-Paced & Highly Customizable Combat System
snippet.description:
Odd Sequence, also known as Odence, is an indie-action game with armed bots and various RPG elements in platformer gameplay. Geometric characters and a flat, minimalist art style give this game its uniqueness. This game focuses heavily on the combat aspect and the attack customization.

Maybe there are still some who don't know Odd Sequence's main gameplay? Let me tell you in this video. To put it simply, you move a character called "Bot" who carries a weapon. The main goal in this game is to defeat all the enemies that attack you. That's it, easy right?

Are you interested in playing Odd Sequence, but you can't buy it yet? Don't worry, the demo version is available. You can play Odd Sequence for free for 30 minutes each week!

Steam store page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2896040/Odd_Sequence/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=social_media&utm_campaign=demo-launching&utm_term=odd+sequence&utm_content=text_link

#games #indiegame  #actiongames #platformergames #hackandslashgames  #gamedev #indonesiangame #gameindonesia
